GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
RISC-V: Make port I/O string accessors actually work

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 1acee4616930fc07265cb8e539753a8062daa8e0, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit fab957c11efe2f405e08b9f0d080524bc2631428. For more details please see the references link.
